info.title: Procurement for Consumers API
info.description:
**DEPERECATED**

**This API has been deprecated and should not be used anymore. Please use the API V2 instead**

This is the documentation of the Zaikio Procurement (Consumers) API V1 Endpoints. You can
use this API to browse the catalog and search for articles, manage relationships with
suppliers and create orders.

When working with orders, we need to know where the order should be delivered, which
requires [Site](https://docs.zaikio.com/api/directory/directory.html#/Sites)
information. This can be retrieved from the Hub, so you should additionally request
the `directory.sites.r` scope when authenticating.

## Provided OAuth Scopes
- `procurement_consumer.catalog.r` [`Organization`]: Browse the catalog
- `procurement_consumer.contracts.rw` [`Organization`]: Manage contracts with suppliers
- `procurement_consumer.orders.rw` [`Organization`]: Manage orders and read invoices

get.description:
List all Articles
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.catalog.r` or `procurement_consumer.catalog.rw`

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of the current collection that shall be returned

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of items included in the response, ie., the page size

base_unit.description: The base unit in which this article is counted

certifications.description: A list of certifications for this particular substrate

classification_reports.description: A list of reference reports, which could be related to the certifications

coated.description: Describes the sides on which the paper is coated

description.description: The marketing copy or description of the article
description.example: A high volume matt paper with a pleasant feel and non-reflective surface.

finish.description: The type of surface finish of the substrate

manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of this article

name.description: The marketing name of the article

brand_color.description: Primary brand colour in hex colour format

logo_url.description: A URL pointing to a SVG, JPG or PNG image of the supplier's logo

items.description: A link that belongs to an object

href.description: The target location of the link

rel.description: Describes the relation type of the link to the object.

Link.description:
Links to previous and next pages, in the format described in [RFC 8288](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8288)
The relations `first`, `prev`, `next` and `last` can be present.

Current-Page.description: The current page of the paginated response

Total-Count.description: The total number of items in this collection

Total-Pages.description: The total number of pages for the current page size in this collection

400.description:
Bad Request

This is returned when invalid page or per_page params have been sent.

get.description:
List all Variants
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.catalog.r` or `procurement_consumer.catalog.rw`

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of the current collection that shall be returned

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of items included in the response, ie., the page size

brightness.description:
Whiteness of the substrate as a percentage (>= 0).
Some substrates have higher than 100 brightness value due to Optical Brightness Agent use.
type: integer

category.description: The product category of the substrate

dimensions_unit.description: The unit used for dimensions and weight of the variant

grain.description: Grain of the substrate. Please note that we validate width and height dimensions depending on grain: long grain: `width <= height` and short grain: `width >= height`

height.description: The height of the substrate in millimeter (metric), with changes of the direction of rotation do not replace (!) with the substrate's width

global_trade_item_number.description:
Global Trade Item Numbers (also known as GTINs) are numbers used to uniquely identify a product. Valid GTINs include EANs (International Article Numbers) and Universal Product Codes (UPCs), and these numbers are usually encoded into barcodes on products.
Zaikio supports 8, 12, 13 and 14-digit variants of this number, wrapped in a string.

optical_brightness_agent.description: A boolean flag indicating presence of Optical Brightness Agent (OBA)

optical_brightness_agent_amount.description: The gain in delta-b (dB) provided by the Optical Brightness Agent

paper_weight.description: Paper weight of the substrate specified as grams per square meter (gsm) or lb (basis weight)

paper_weight_unit.description: The unit in which the paper weight is defined

roughness.description: The roughness of the substrate in mL/min

thickness.description: Thickness of the substrate in micrometer (metric)

transparency.description: The transparency of the substrate as a percentage (0..100)

unit_system.description: (Deprecated) The unit system used for dimensions and weight of the variant. Please refer to `dimensions_unit` instead

whiteness.description:
Whiteness of the substrate as a percentage (>= 0).
Some substrates have higher than 100 whiteness value due to Optical Brightness Agent use.
type: integer

width.description: The width of the substrate in millimeter (metric), with changes of the direction of rotation do not replace (!) with the substrate's height

name.description: The marketing name of the article

manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of this article

items.description: A link that belongs to an object

href.description: The target location of the link

rel.description: Describes the relation type of the link to the object.

Link.description:
Links to previous and next pages, in the format described in [RFC 8288](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8288)
The relations `first`, `prev`, `next` and `last` can be present.

Current-Page.description: The current page of the paginated response

Total-Count.description: The total number of items in this collection

Total-Pages.description: The total number of pages for the current page size in this collection

400.description:
Bad Request

This is returned when invalid page or per_page params have been sent.

post.description:
Create a new order
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.orders.w` or `procurement_consumer.orders.rw`

delivery_mode.description: You can split your Order into multiple Deliveries – for example with different delivery dates or to different addresses – when in the mode is set to `splitted` When you choose `complete` then you do not need to create DeliveryLineItem for each OrderLine yourself, instead the system will automatically generate a DeliveryLineItem for each OrderLine.

state_event.description:
You can change and update existing orders as long as they are in the state `draft`. When set `place` then the supplier is immediately notified about this new order. Note: Once a order is placed you cannot return to the `draft` state anymore.
As long as the order is in the state `placed` it can still be cancelled with `cancel_by_consumer`. If the order is transitioned further, you can only use `request_cancelation` that a supplier must confirm.

desired_delivery_date.description:
The preferred date for this delivery, specified by your application. If unset,
suppliers will assume you mean "as soon as possible".

delivery_mode.description: You can split your Order into multiple Deliveries – for example with different delivery dates or to different addresses – when in the mode is set to `splitted` When you choose `complete` then you do not need to create DeliveryLineItem for each OrderLine yourself, instead the system will automatically generate a DeliveryLineItem for each OrderLine.

gross_total.description: The gross total of the order in the given currency unit

net_handling_fee.description: For example a fee for customization or a minimum quantity surcharge

net_total.description: The net total of the order in the given currency unit

state.description: Describes the current state of the order. See docs for details about allowed state transitions.

state_reason.description: A text written be the supplier that describes the reason for the current state. This text might include information about errors, cancelation reasons or reasons for delay.

taxes.description: The taxes on the order in the given currency unit

customer_number.description: The customer number to be used when placing orders

article_types.description: The types of article that the Supplier intends to offer to everybody, which is displayed to the customer to help them decide whether to connect with the Supplier. Please note that the Supplier may not actually have any articles of these types available to you after connecting, as new article types are added here first before then becoming available in the platform.

automatically_accept_contract_requests.description: If true the supplier will automatically accept any contract request immediately and add the consumer to the default sales group. If false every consumer will have to go through a vetting process during which they the supplier actively creates a contract and adds the consumer to a sales group. Please note that the event succession is unaffected by this, so in both cases you will receive an event for created contract requests as well as created contracts.

availability.description: Suppliers who will be joining the platform in future are marked as "coming_soon", "beta" Suppliers will invite individual customers to contract for early access and testing, and "live" Suppliers are open to all potential customers. By default only "live" suppliers are listed in our APIs.

parameters.description: Search query

parameters.description: Filter search results by article coating. Supports multiple values

parameters.description: Filter search results by article finish. Supports multiple values

parameters.description: Filter search results by article type. Supports multiple values

parameters.description: Filter search results by variant categories. Supports multiple values

parameters.description: Filter search results by variant forms. Multiple values possible using array syntax

parameters.description: Filter search results by variant width. Supports multiple values and comparison operators

parameters.description: Filter search results by variant height. Supports multiple values and comparison operators

parameters.description: Filter search results by substrate weight (only applies for substrate variants). Supports multiple values

width.description: The width of the substrate in millimeter (metric), with changes of the direction of rotation do not replace (!) with the substrate's height

height.description: The height of the substrate in millimeter (metric), with changes of the direction of rotation do not replace (!) with the substrate's width

global_trade_item_number.description:
Global Trade Item Numbers (also known as GTINs) are numbers used to uniquely identify a product. Valid GTINs include EANs (International Article Numbers) and Universal Product Codes (UPCs), and these numbers are usually encoded into barcodes on products.
Zaikio supports 8, 12, 13 and 14-digit variants of this number, wrapped in a string.

thickness.description: Thickness of the substrate in micrometer (metric)

optical_brightness_agent.description: A boolean flag indicating presence of Optical Brightness Agent (OBA)

optical_brightness_agent_amount.description: The gain in delta-b (dB) provided by the Optical Brightness Agent

paper_weight.description: Paper weight of the substrate specified as grams per square meter (gsm) or lb (basis weight)

paper_weight_unit.description: The unit in which the paper weight is defined

grain.description: Grain of the substrate. Please note that we validate width and height dimensions depending on grain: long grain: `width <= height` and short grain: `width >= height`

transparency.description: The transparency of the substrate as a percentage (0..100)

whiteness.description:
Whiteness of the substrate as a percentage (>= 0).
Some substrates have higher than 100 whiteness value due to Optical Brightness Agent use.
type: integer

brightness.description:
Whiteness of the substrate as a percentage (>= 0).
Some substrates have higher than 100 brightness value due to Optical Brightness Agent use.
type: integer

get.description:
List all custom suppliers
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.orders.r` or `procurement_consumer.orders.rw`

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of the current collection that shall be returned

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of items included in the response, ie., the page size

name.description: The name of the custom supplier

customer_number.description: Customer number of the consumer for this supplier, will be sent with custom orders

order_recipient_email.description: Email address that orders with this supplier should be delivered to

order_recipient_phone.description: Phone number that orders of this supplier should be delivered to

Link.description:
Links to previous and next pages, in the format described in [RFC 8288](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8288)
The relations `first`, `prev`, `next` and `last` can be present.

Current-Page.description: The current page of the paginated response

Total-Count.description: The total number of items in this collection

Total-Pages.description: The total number of pages for the current page size in this collection

400.description:
Bad Request

This is returned when invalid page or per_page params have been sent.
